name: Robot Revenge
description:
Description

Humans have developed super-intelligent robots for home use, however, they have recently been used for such simple things and have been mistreated. This caused one robot, that was being tested in a laboratory to stand up to the humans with the goal, to KILL ALL HUMANS

All content of this game was created by me -Red Dev-

Controls

movement  -  A-left  D-right

shoot  -  mouse button left

jump  -  space

Important notice

Whilst this game was released for the Indie Game Dev Beginners #003 game jam, it will most likely receive further updates dew to the fact that as of release it has very few levels.
